museums.name: Andean Sanctuaries Museum
museums.description: Archaeological museum housing the preserved Inca mummy “Juanita” and ritual artifacts from high-altitude sanctuaries.

museums.name: José María Morante Archaeological Museum
museums.description: Archaeological museum of the National University of San Agustín with over 11,000 exhibits from pre-Hispanic to colonial periods.

museums.name: Municipal Historical Museum (Guillermo Zegarra Meneses)
museums.location: Plaza San Francisco / Calle San Francisco 407, Arequipa, Peru
museums.description: History museum from pre-Hispanic to Republican times located in the San Francisco complex, with artifacts, portrait gallery, and pinacoteca.

museums.name: Santa Catalina Monastery Museum
museums.description: Partly active colonial monastery with cloisters open as museum; features architecture, art gallery with over 400 colonial paintings.

museums.name: La Recoleta Convent Museum
museums.description: Convent museum founded 1648, with cloisters, galleries of archaeological, historical-artistic, ethnographic items, and a historic library.

museums.name: Santa Teresa Museum of Viceroyal Art
museums.description: Museum of viceregal sacred art inside a Carmelite convent, with thematic salons, murals, sculptures, metalwork, and souvenir shop.

museums.name: Cathedral Museum
museums.location: Plaza de Armas (lateral portal of Calle Santa Catalina), Arequipa, Peru
museums.description: Museum housed within Arequipa Cathedral, displaying religious art, sculptures, Cusco School paintings, and a monumental organ.

museums.name: Central Reserve Bank Museum
museums.description: Numismatics and colonial art museum featuring currency evolution and Cusco School paintings within the BCRP network.

museums.name: Museum of Contemporary Art (MAC)
museums.description: Contemporary art museum showcasing local and national artists with permanent and rotating exhibitions, workshops, photography.

museums.name: Casa Museo Mario Vargas Llosa
museums.description: Museum in the childhood home of Nobel laureate Mario Vargas Llosa, with holograms, 3D films, personal items and multimedia on his life and work.

museums.name: San Francisco de Asís Convent Museum
museums.description: Colonial Franciscan convent and museum featuring cloisters, art collection, altarpieces, furniture, and underground catacombs and library.

museums.name: Museo del Mundo Postal
museums.description: Postal museum with a wide collection of stamps and postal history objects from around the world.

museums.name: Museo de los Recuerdos
museums.description: ‘Museum of Memories’ showcasing everyday objects from Arequipa across decades—nostalgic and anecdotal exhibitions.

museums.name: Casa del Moral (Gallery)
museums.description: Baroque 18th-century ancestral house used as an exhibition gallery with Cusco School paintings and a large library.

museums.name: Tristán del Pozo House (Art Gallery)
museums.description: 18th-century house featuring Andean-Baroque architecture; now hosts art gallery with works by notable Peruvian artists.
